events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications thoroughly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for software development roles.
A recruiter with expertise in engineering positions has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your technical background and experience relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing detailed answers during the initial screening phase.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC with our senior software engineers.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and our team was impressed by your problem-solving skills and coding abilities.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your cultural fit and address any questions about the company policies.
The HR interview has been completed, and feedback indicates that you would be a great addition to our engineering team.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
We have received your acceptance of the offer and look forward to welcoming you aboard as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started, including orientation sessions and setup for development tools and accounts.
The hiring process for your position is now closed. Congratulations and welcome to the engineering team!
